page.title: 18HOME LIFE
page.content: {FOOD I LIKE}by Warner, aged 10. I like a lot more kinds of food than my dad does. I like it well-cooked but not burned. From a fish and chip shop, I like white pudding or German sausage. I also like my mum's curries with chapattis or nan bread, and her cheesecake and trifle. My Dad makes mince that is the best I ever tasted. {MY PETS}by Jennifer, aged 10. I have four pets - a rabbit, a guinea pig and 2 fish. My rabbit is called Snowball, the guinea pig is Squeak, and the fish are Caramera and Jaws. In the afternoon I let Snowball and Squeak out in the garden to run about and get some exercise. When they get tired, I lift them and put them on the straw in their hutch. On Saturdays I clean the hutch out and put in fresh straw, sawdust, newspaper, and some material for their comfort.
